items.content_html: A lightweight text generation app using React, TypeScript, and Vite on the client side, paired with an Express server leveraging OpenAI API for GPT-4o-mini responses. Features include seamless user interaction, Axios-based communication, and an efficient proxy setup with CORS support for smooth client-server integration.
